00016 #ifdef SET_NULL_DACL
00017 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbNullSecurityDesciptor { 
00018   public:
00019     SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR sd;
00020     SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES sa; 
00021 
00022     dbNullSecurityDesciptor() { 
00023         InitializeSecurityDescriptor(&sd, SECURITY_DESCRIPTOR_REVISION);
00024         SetSecurityDescriptorDacl(&sd, TRUE, NULL, FALSE);
00025         sa.nLength = sizeof(sa);
00026         sa.bInheritHandle = TRUE; 
00027         sa.lpSecurityDescriptor = &sd;
00028     }
00029     
00030     static dbNullSecurityDesciptor instance;
00031 };
00032 #define FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES &dbNullSecurityDesciptor::instance.sa
00033 #else    
00034 #define FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES NULL
00035 #endif

00037 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbMutex { 
00038     CRITICAL_SECTION cs;
00039     bool             initialized;
00040   public:
00041     dbMutex() {
00042         InitializeCriticalSection(&cs);
00043         initialized = true;
00044     }
00045     ~dbMutex() {
00046         DeleteCriticalSection(&cs);
00047         initialized = false;
00048     }
00049     bool isInitialized() { 
00050         return initialized;
00051     }
00052     void lock() {
00053         if (initialized) { 
00054             EnterCriticalSection(&cs);
00055         }
00056     }
00057     void unlock() {
00058         if (initialized) { 
00059             LeaveCriticalSection(&cs);
00060         }
00061     }
00062 };

00064 #define thread_proc WINAPI
00065 
00066 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbThread { 
00067     HANDLE h;
00068   public:
00069     typedef void (thread_proc* thread_proc_t)(void*);
00070 
00071     static void sleep(time_t sec) { 
00072         Sleep((DWORD)(sec*1000));
00073     }
00074 
00075 
00076     void create(thread_proc_t f, void* arg) { 
00077         DWORD threadid;
00078         h = CreateThread(FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, 0, LPTHREAD_START_ROUTINE(f), arg,
00079                          0, &threadid);
00080     }
00081     enum ThreadPriority { 
00082         THR_PRI_LOW, 
00083         THR_PRI_HIGH
00084     };
00085 
00086     void setPriority(ThreadPriority pri) { 
00087         SetThreadPriority(h, pri == THR_PRI_LOW ? THREAD_PRIORITY_IDLE : THREAD_PRIORITY_HIGHEST);
00088     }
00089         
00090     void join() { 
00091         WaitForSingleObject(h, INFINITE);
00092         CloseHandle(h);
00093         h = NULL;
00094     }
00095     void detach() { 
00096         if (h != NULL) { 
00097             CloseHandle(h);
00098             h = NULL;
00099         }
00100     }   
00101     dbThread() { 
00102         h = NULL; 
00103     }
00104     ~dbThread() { 
00105         if (h != NULL) { 
00106             CloseHandle(h);
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110     static int getCurrentThreadId() {
00111         return GetCurrentThreadId();
00112     }
00113 
00114     static int numberOfProcessors() { 
00115 #ifdef PHAR_LAP
00116         return 1;
00117 #else
00118         SYSTEM_INFO sysinfo;
00119         GetSystemInfo(&sysinfo);
00120         return sysinfo.dwNumberOfProcessors;
00121 #endif
00122     }
00123 };

00125 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbProcessId { 
00126     DWORD tid;
00127   public:
00128     bool operator != (dbProcessId const& other) const { 
00129         return tid != other.tid;
00130     }
00131 
00132     void clear() { 
00133         tid = 0;
00134     }
00135 
00136     static dbProcessId getCurrent() {
00137         dbProcessId curr;
00138         curr.tid = GetCurrentThreadId();
00139         return curr;
00140     }
00141 };

00145 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbInitializationMutex { 
00146     HANDLE m;
00147   public: 
00148     enum initializationStatus { 
00149         InitializationError, 
00150         AlreadyInitialized,
00151         NotYetInitialized
00152     };
00153     initializationStatus initialize(char_t const* name) { 
00154         initializationStatus status;
00155         m = CreateMutex(FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, true, name);
00156         if (GetLastError() == ERROR_ALREADY_EXISTS) { 
00157             status = WaitForSingleObject(m, INFINITE) == WAIT_OBJECT_0 
00158                    ? AlreadyInitialized : InitializationError;
00159             ReleaseMutex(m);
00160         } else if (m != NULL) { 
00161             status = NotYetInitialized;
00162         } else { 
00163             status = InitializationError;
00164         }
00165         return status;
00166     }
00167     void done() { 
00168         ReleaseMutex(m);
00169     }
00170     bool close() {
00171         CloseHandle(m);
00172         return false;
00173     }
00174     void erase() { 
00175         close();
00176     }
00177     dbInitializationMutex() { 
00178         m = NULL;
00179     }
00180 };

00183 const int dbMaxSemValue = 1000000;
00184 
00185 
00186 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbSemaphore { 
00187   protected:
00188     HANDLE s;
00189   public:
00190     bool wait(unsigned msec = INFINITE) { 
00191         int rc = WaitForSingleObject(s, msec);
00192         assert(rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0 || rc == WAIT_TIMEOUT);
00193         return rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0;
00194     }
00195     void signal(unsigned inc = 1) {
00196         if (inc != 0) { 
00197             ReleaseSemaphore(s, inc, NULL);
00198         }
00199     }
00200     void reset() { 
00201         while (WaitForSingleObject(s, 0) == WAIT_OBJECT_0);
00202     }    
00203     bool open(char_t const* name, unsigned initValue = 0) {
00204         s = CreateSemaphore(FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, initValue, dbMaxSemValue, name);
00205         return s != NULL; 
00206     }
00207     void close() {
00208         CloseHandle(s);
00209     }
00210     void erase() { 
00211         close();
00212     }
00213     dbSemaphore() { 
00214         s = NULL;
00215     }
00216 };
00217 
00218 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbEvent { 
00219   protected:
00220     HANDLE e;
00221   public:
00222     bool wait(unsigned msec = INFINITE) { 
00223         int rc = WaitForSingleObject(e, msec);
00224         assert(rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0 || rc == WAIT_TIMEOUT);
00225         return rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0;
00226     }
00227     void signal() {
00228         SetEvent(e);
00229     }
00230     void reset() {
00231         ResetEvent(e);
00232     }
00233     bool open(char_t const* name, bool signaled = false) {
00234         e = CreateEvent(FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, true, signaled, name);
00235         return e != NULL; 
00236     }
00237     void close() {
00238         CloseHandle(e);
00239     }
00240     void erase() { 
00241         close();
00242     }
00243     dbEvent() { 
00244         e = NULL;
00245     }
00246 };

00248 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbLocalSemaphore : public dbSemaphore { 
00249   public:
00250     bool wait(dbMutex& mutex, time_t timeoutMsec) { 
00251         mutex.unlock();
00252         int rc = WaitForSingleObject(s, (DWORD)timeoutMsec);
00253         assert(rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0 || rc == WAIT_TIMEOUT);
00254         mutex.lock();
00255         return rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0;
00256     }
00257     void wait(dbMutex& mutex) { 
00258         mutex.unlock();
00259         int rc = WaitForSingleObject(s, INFINITE);
00260         assert(rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0);
00261         mutex.lock();
00262     }
00263     bool open(unsigned initValue = 0) {
00264         return dbSemaphore::open(NULL, initValue);
00265     }
00266 };
00267 
00268 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbLocalEvent : public dbEvent { 
00269   public:
00270     bool wait(dbMutex& mutex, time_t timeoutMsec) { 
00271         mutex.unlock();
00272         int rc = WaitForSingleObject(e, (DWORD)timeoutMsec);
00273         assert(rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0 || rc == WAIT_TIMEOUT);
00274         mutex.lock();
00275         return rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0;
00276     }
00277     void wait(dbMutex& mutex) { 
00278         mutex.unlock();
00279         int rc = WaitForSingleObject(e, INFINITE);
00280         assert(rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0);
00281         mutex.lock();
00282     }
00283     bool open(bool signaled = false) {
00284          return dbEvent::open(NULL, signaled);
00285      }
00286 };

00288 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbWatchDog { 
00289   public:
00290     bool watch() { 
00291         return WaitForSingleObject(mutex, INFINITE) == ERROR_WAIT_NO_CHILDREN;
00292     }
00293     void close() { 
00294         CloseHandle(mutex);
00295     }
00296     bool create(char_t const* name) {
00297         mutex = CreateMutex(FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, true, name);
00298         return mutex != NULL;
00299     }
00300     bool open(char_t const* name) {
00301 #if defined(_WINCE) || defined(UNICODE)
00302         return create(name);
00303 #else
00304         mutex = OpenMutex(MUTEX_ALL_ACCESS, false, name);
00305         return mutex != NULL;
00306 #endif
00307     }
00308     HANDLE mutex;
00309 };

00311 template<class T>
00312 class dbThreadContext { 
00313     unsigned int index;
00314   public:
00315     T* get() { 
00316         return (T*)TlsGetValue(index);
00317     }
00318     void set(T* value) { 
00319         TlsSetValue(index, value);
00320     }
00321     dbThreadContext() { 
00322         index = TlsAlloc();
00323         assert(index != TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES);
00324     }
00325     ~dbThreadContext() { 
00326         TlsFree(index);
00327     }
00328 };
00329 
00330 template<class T>
00331 class dbSharedObject { 
00332     T*     ptr;
00333     HANDLE h;
00334   public:
00335 
00336     bool open(char_t* name) { 
00337 #ifdef NO_MMAP
00338         ptr = new T();
00339 #else
00340         h = CreateFileMapping(INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE,
00341                               FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, PAGE_READWRITE, 0, 
00342                               sizeof(T), name);
00343         if (h == NULL) { 
00344             return false;
00345         }
00346         ptr = (T*)MapViewOfFile(h, FILE_MAP_ALL_ACCESS, 0, 0, 0);
00347         if (ptr == NULL) { 
00348             CloseHandle(h);
00349             return false;
00350         }
00351 #endif
00352         return true;
00353     }
00354 
00355     T* get() { return ptr; }
00356 
00357     void close() { 
00358 #ifdef NO_MMAP
00359         delete[] ptr;
00360 #else
00361         UnmapViewOfFile(ptr);
00362         CloseHandle(h);
00363 #endif
00364     }
00365     void erase() { 
00366         close();
00367     }
00368     dbSharedObject() { 
00369         ptr = NULL;
00370         h = NULL;
00371     }
00372 };

00374 typedef long sharedsem_t;
00375 
00376 #ifdef RECOVERABLE_CRITICAL_SECTION
00377 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbGlobalCriticalSection { 
00378     HANDLE mutex;
00379   public:
00380     void enter() { 
00381         int rc = WaitForSingleObject(mutex, INFINITE);
00382         assert (rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0 || rc == WAIT_ABANDONED);
00383     }
00384 
00385     void leave() {
00386         ReleaseMutex(mutex);
00387     }
00388 
00389     bool create(char_t const* name, long* count) { 
00390         mutex = CreateMutex(FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, false, name);
00391         return mutex != NULL;
00392     }
00393 
00394     bool open(char_t const* name, long* count) { 
00395         mutex = OpenMutex(MUTEX_ALL_ACCESS, true, name);
00396         return mutex != NULL;
00397     }
00398 
00399     void close() { 
00400         CloseHandle(mutex);
00401     }
00402     void erase() { 
00403         close();
00404     }
00405     dbGlobalCriticalSection() {
00406         mutex = NULL;
00407     }
00408         
00409 };
00410 #else
00411 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbGlobalCriticalSection { 
00412     HANDLE       event;
00413     sharedsem_t* count;
00414 
00415   public:
00416     void enter() { 
00417         if (InterlockedDecrement(count) != 0) { 
00418             // another process is in critical section
00419             int rc = WaitForSingleObject(event, INFINITE);
00420             assert (rc == WAIT_OBJECT_0);
00421         }
00422     }
00423 
00424     void leave() { 
00425         if (InterlockedIncrement(count) <= 0) { 
00426             // some other processes try to enter critical section
00427             SetEvent(event);
00428         }
00429     }
00430 
00431     bool open(char_t const* name, long* count) { 
00432         this->count = count;
00433         event = OpenEvent(EVENT_ALL_ACCESS, FALSE, name);
00434         return event != NULL;
00435     }
00436     bool create(char_t const* name, long* count) { 
00437         this->count = count;
00438         *count = 1;
00439         event = CreateEvent(FASTDB_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES, false, false, name);
00440         return event != NULL;
00441     }
00442     void close() { 
00443         CloseHandle(event);
00444     }
00445     void erase() { 
00446         close();
00447     }
00448     dbGlobalCriticalSection() {
00449         event = NULL;
00450     }
00451         
00452 };
00453 #endif
